channel.title: The Basement
channel.itunes:author: RoyalGraphX
channel.description: Welcome to The Basement. A podcast in which co-hosts Alan and Kevin invite a series of friends to enjoy some herbal essence, With a bit of explicit content, this podcast never falls short from funny altered thoughts to bad jokes so bad, they're good.
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to The Basement. A podcast in which co-hosts Alan and Kevin invite a series of friends to enjoy some herbal essence, With a bit of explicit content, this podcast never falls short from funny altered thoughts to bad jokes so bad, they're good.
channel.itunes:subtitle: 420 Powered Conversations.

item.title: The Beginning
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Episode 1 of The Basement Podcast. Today we are joined by Co-hosts Alan and Kevin as we invite our longtime friend, Enrique to the set. What resulted is an almost 45 minute long audio experience filled with dumb jokes, and explicit profanity. Along with speech impaired by herbel essence, you are welcomed to enjoy some of this episodes favorite songs, featuring a special extended version of 'Maria I'm Drunk', and a previous version of 'ASTROTHUNDER', both by Travis Scott, we hope you enjoy today's episode, and stay tuned for more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1 Shenanigans
item.itunes:author: RoyalGraphX
